I'm sorry, Brynn.
Stopping power doesn't come cheap.
Lucky he bailed me out.
A good holster makes all the difference.
No mercy.
Potent, but horrible recoil.
Have we always looked so alike?
Embrace the infinite chorus...
Unblemished, despite everything.
When Hit:
She was right. I am better than this.
She believed in me. And she was right.
Deep breathing. Just like she taught me.
Calm under pressure. I can do this.
I have everything to lose — and everything to gain.
I don't fear. I have ammo.
Take heart — this eagle believes in you.
Look at me. We have this. We always did.
I never miss my mark.
I have one job, and I'll be damned if I fail it now.
Clear your mind. You are the predator. They are the prey.
And now you will see as I see.
No more games. It's time to put them down.
Enough playing around. Now we go for the kill.
One at a time. Grind the weak links down and they'll crumble.
We are the top of the food chain. It's high time we started acting like it.
I was born to survive, and raised to adapt.
In weakness, there is strength. In toil, there is power.
This is what I live for. This is what I was meant to do.
They gave me an inch — and now I'll take the mile.
...Worse than anything I dealt with in the Coven.
I knew this was going to be a suicide mission...
I don't desert, but I wouldn't blame anyone for wanting to.
How many have we slain? And yet this hellpit spits more out!
This isn't a retreat. Promise.
I just...my gun is better in the back.
I just...I need a moment to reload!
*Fumbling the gun*
Nothing is safe here. We're fooling ourselves.
We've hardly secured a perimeter. How can we expect safety?
*Hyperventilating*
...Too much. We need to pull out.
Gambling like this was a mistake.
...Biggest fluke I've ever seen.
We're way more outmatched than I thought.
Our chances just went from bad to worse.
Hard to muster up the courage, isn't it?
Thought that would be lethal, if I'm being honest.
Better you than me, really.
You're a lot bolder than I am.
I just...can't. I'm sorry.
No! That would open up the flank!
I just...don't have the mindset for this right now.
No good. My heads not in it.
I CAN'T HANDLE IT ANYMORE!
...Joining up with you lot was a mistake.
If you can't fight, you will be made to fight.
Be glad I am so tolerant. The Coven were far harsher than this.
A bullet for anyone who deserts.
I am the officer at rank. You will not question me.
I don't take orders from you.
By all means, rest. But tomorrow morning we're waking early.
Drop and give me 20. If you complain, I'll up it to 50.
The fact that I even have to do this speaks volumes.
Fight harder. I'll give you a taste of what'll happen if you don't.
Not enough. More.
Hmph. Good.
The Coven would have shot you for that.
Time to own up. No excuses.
Gentle reminder that incompetence will be punished.
Saves me the effort of motivating you myself.
I think you'll do far better remaining right where you are.
Word to the wise: the Commander has rights to any position.
Quiet. My patience has been exhausted as is.
Word to the wise: you do not ask things of your Commander.
Does it look like I want your help?
If I had need of you, I would've asked.
DESERTERS, ALL OF YOU! I WILL—
So, how much did the Coven pay you this time?
Should've known my actions would have consequences...
Even if none of you are traitors, I'm not taking chances.
If you out yourself as the plant, I promise I'll make it quick.
Bear with me, please. My trust is thin as is.
Why are you so concerned about my position all of a sudden?
Better I do this than get stabbed in the back.
I would help, but I need to keep my eyes open for the time being.
Unpredictability is the only way to ensure my survival.
Can't listen to you this time. Sorry.
Disturb me in my sleep at your own peril.
There will be investigation tonight. Mark my words.
The gig is up, traitor.
You almost fooled me. Almost.
False ambush? A standard tactic of the Coven.
Definitely not. I've seen this happen before.
Real smart, forcing me in the middle of two sides.
If you want to earn my trust, start covering me!
How deep does this conspiracy go, I wonder?
Was that intentional? No, can't be...
If they're in on it too...
Is everyone in it? Or were you just lucky?
If you think you're fooling anyone, you're stupid.
Hard to separate incompetence from conspiracy, to be honest.
I trust you. And that means they're after you too.
Careful. The plant might not just be here for me.
I trust you. But they still might use the opportunity.
Not now. The risk of betrayal is too great.
I'll make do without. The risk is too high.
Given the current situation, I cannot accept.
Some naturopaths did specialize in slow release poisons...
I was getting along just fine, thank you very much.
...I could use a hand. But I'm not sure if I can trust you.
What was that behind your back?
I cannot afford a distraction. Not at this time.
Not now. I need to keep my eyes open.
Stop. I asked you earlier to back off.
You are more eager to help than is comfortable for me.
I would like you to try a bite first.
Feh. Even if not poisoned, human food never takes well.
THE COVEN COMES FOR ME AT LAST!
I was in need of a preen anyway.
Paint my feathers red. I can take it.
You lot are younger. It's better if I take the blows.
You stop caring after the 100th scar.
If a feather gets stuck in your equipment, I apologise.
I'm not an artist, but painting the walls with blood does sound appealling.
It's about time I did my part.
I have a blade. I can afford to get into melee.
Let's toy with them. I'm actually enjoying this.
We're so far ahead. We can afford a little chaos.
*Screeching in pain and pleasure*
Could someone spare a blade? These feathers need to go.
Slip behind them. I'll draw their fire.
*Warcaw* At me, you fools! I'm not afraid!
*Picking at own feathers*
Just need to get the blood pumping...
I don't desert.
We'll have to fight them again later. Why bother?
*Amused Caw* Go on. Try me again.
It's a proper bloodbath now!
*Sigh* I suppose it's reaching to expect much from these brutes.
I am not disappointed! Just...expecting more.
Why flinch? It doesn't look that bad.
I think you spilt blood on me. I don't mind.
I see the need to move. But I think we're far enough as is.
No need. Our positioning is optimal.
We're ahead. Use it when we aren't.
Save it. These wounds will scar anyway.
If we were actually in trouble, I would accept.
I appreciate it. But I don't need it.
I commend your eagerness, but I can make do.
Someone else might need it. Don't worry about me.
I asked for a blade, not a bandage!
No thanks. I'm in the middle of a good preen.
...Sorry, but not this time. It isn't necessary.
We can get by. You don't need my help.
Gone without food plenty when I was still with the Coven.
...What was my record for fasting? Eight days?
I PUSHED IT TOO FAR!
I don't do this for money. But with that said...
I am your Commander. Remember that.
Know your betters and fall in line, soldiers.
As Commander, I am entitled to double share.
Let me by. My blade is sufficient.
They are vulnerable! Charge!
Let me back. My gun is sufficient.
It is unwise to leave your Commander in the front.
If you had more experience, you would follow my lead.
One second. I must consider our strategy...
Quiet! It is not your place to command me.
My strategy hinges on this move!
Where is our tent? I need a war room to plan!
Where is my share? You know of my experience!
What is this? Our formation is sloppy!
The Coven would be appalled at this treatment of authority!
Very good. I see my oversight has paid off.
Excellent. Much better than your fellows.
I see my experience is still needed.
Looks like you need a few days of Coven training.
What is this? My authority supersedes yours!
I don't normally pull rank, but you must learn your place.
WHY ARE YOU LEAVING ME? I NEED-
I threw it all away...and I still lost her, in the end.
Will I ever see her again? Is there ever a good ending?
I could've had a happy life. Better than dying in this pit...
...I wish I was never here. That none of this ever happened.
Not much left to do, except die on the frontline.
Anywhere my talons can carry me. Not that it matters.
Maybe I'll shoot them from the back. Maybe.
Does it even matter anymore?
Hard to fight a war you no longer believe in.
Biggest lie I told myself was that I was doing this for her.
I have no strategy. Other than to die.
The tactics, the plans, the strategy...it didn't matter. It never did.
It's so cold, sleeping without her.
I'll never see her again, will I? You don't need to lie to me.
Maybe I'll buy you some time. Maybe.
Time for my last stand.
Everything hurts. But not as much as losing her.
She would be ashamed to see me again, wouldn't she? I can't...
Win or lose, I don't want to run.
No point. No point in any of it, really.
There's nothing left. Not for me.
I can't pretend to care anymore.
No more. The fight's been kicked out of me.
I can't get back up. I can't go on.
Why are you still helping me? Why fight on?
I'm sorry. I won't.
I'm not in the mindset. Not sure if I ever will be again.
I can't muster. I wish I could.
Leave me alone! I don't want this anymore.
I know you believe in me. But you shouldn't.
She was such a good cook...but I'll never taste it again.
I'm empty. But not because of the food.
I DON'T CARE ANYMORE!
What is this? Where is Shepard?
Where am I? This isn't Palaven. Or the Normandy.
Who are you people? And where are we?
What year is it? All of this technology is antiquated!
...Feathers? What is this? I'm not myself!
I'm just trying to find my way. Let me forward.
I'll take the front, I suppose.
This thing isn't a sniper, but I suppose it'll do.
If Virmire was any indication, I should not be in melee.
I can't get a handle on this outdated gun!
Gun's overheated. Can't risk firing.
Do I have to listen to everything? Shepard gave us agency...
I've never been a particularly good Turian.
I'm not supposed to be here. I need to find Shepard.
...Why do I have a beak? Where are my mandibles?
Suppose I might as well jump into the fray.
Reminds me of Omega, all those mercs coming after me...
Is this a dream? If so...
I don't even know you. And you've been leering at me.
This must be a nightmare. Only one way to wake up.
Here's hoping I'm just asleep on the Normandy.
This is a good defensive position. Why give it up?
I wasn't a coward then, and I won't be now.
No shields? Oh. Right.
Kinetic barriers haven't been invented yet, have they?
These fighting tactics are different, too.
Every dodge is a gamble. I hate that.
Not Turian Military, but I respect the effort.
Heh. You remind me of Wrex.
I miss Shepard already...
Reminds me of Jack's aim. But you don't have the biotics.
No medigel? That stings.
Took a rocket to the face once, you know.
Almost looked like you had a barrier up.
Almost textbook. Except the year isn't 2185.
From where I come from, teammates don't ask for my position.
Really? Does the sharpshooter not get monopoly on position?
What is that? Not used to it all being outdated...
Is that even sanitized properly? Is any of this?
Not medigel? Then it won't help.
Medical standards really have fallen, haven't they?
The only help I need is to find my way out of here!
How exactly does this help? I geninuely don't know.
No time. I'm busy figuring out how this gun works.
...Why are you asking me to do that? I don't know how.
These aren't dextro rations!
Risking a reaction now wouldn't be wise.
I CAN'T GO ON WITHOUT YOU, SHEPARD!

Coven Tactics
Reminisce
Combat Provisions

Callously efficient and dangerously effective, the Arbiter excels at cutting down the middling ranks, wielding rifle, pistol and blade to get the job done. And should his allies falter, he knows how to hold the line.

The Arbiter dons a decorated uniform and uses a versatile arsenal. His repeater rifle excels at medium range, and a trusty blade handles the close encounters. And when all else fails, switching to a pistol is faster than reloading.
Resourceful and surprisingly social, the Arbiter makes good use of his respite. Packing provisions, stories and an indomitable spirit, any team will appreciate his expertise.

Draw!
Draw!
The heart of the world. Everything the Coven wanted. But it'll die with me.
My uniform is on fire!
The smoke is burning my eyes!
*Struggling and screeching*
The war I wage is empty...
...Brynn?
I missed you, my love.
I wish we had more time together...
My love is not reserved for you, hag!
How dare you draw on those feelings!
No more mind games.
Damn vultures...
...That was more painful than I expected.
No hard feelings, right?
...Have we always looked so alike?
...So that's how it feels.
Sorry for this, sir.
Brynn...will I ever see you again?
...Hard to handle even when you know it's coming.
I always bring extra. Always.
I've seen too many friends bleed to death. Don't join them.
Never too many supplies. Not when war is involved.
Nora used to carry these. Wonder how she's doing...
They were wrong about many things. But not about how to fight.
They raised me from birth. Hard to shake some of those lessons.
Cut the indoctrination, and some of their tactics were brilliant.
Zrell taught me much. Wonder how he'd see me now...
Bruised and battered, but not broken.
There is no pride in war. Only getting back up after being kicked down.
No one is untouchable. And I won't pretend that I am.
Let me tell you a story.
Nora. Felnum. Zuriel. Those were my squadmates.
The reason I'm here? An iron fist, and a long awaited betrayal.
...Only Nora survived the aftermath. We parted soon after.
Leaving the Coven was the best thing that ever happened to me.
...I was but a tool to them. But I knew too much.
How about a wager? First to ten kills?
This scar on my beak? Sure, I can talk about it.
Brynn would have liked you. Oh how I miss her...
I prefer to rip the bandaid. Sorry if this hurts.
Not the greatest patch job, but it should hold for now.
Easier to hurt than heal, I'll admit.
Help me load my magazines — it'll take your mind off things.
Your concerns are valid. Our line of work isn't easy...
Talk to me. The least I can do is listen.
Knew it was the right choice to join up with you lot.
Better than a standard Coven mission. Consider me impressed.
Once we get back to the Hamlet, drinks are on me.
I don't believe in warning shots.
Knock knock - it's the big bad eagle.
Take your shot and make it count.
Let's keep this simple.
Sit down and stay down.
Scratch one!
Scoped and dropped!
This fowl has a firearm.
Tag 'em and bag 'em!
We're being flanked!
They're trying to break ranks!
I'm out of position!
Hold the line!
Weapons free.
Eyes open.
Stay in formation.
My eyes hurt.
There goes the uniform...
Watch the chemical warfare!
I need treatment!
So long as it doesn't jam the gun...
It'll clot...eventually.
Need to keep a dry trigger finger...
Stained right up. Fantastic.
*Grits teeth*
The worst part of war.
Really? Just...really?
Fantastic. Just what I needed.
Can someone else do it next time?
Oh, that felt nice.
Does have a nice shine to it...
Something worth the trek. Finally.
I've got a pounding headache.
Need to get a grip...
Steady. Just...steady.
Just need to...walk it off.
Bloody hell, that hurt.
*Coughing blood*
Lean on me if you have to.
We've got wounded!
Are you clear?
Every war ends...
Don't...don't let me sit down.
I can't...I can't breathe...
Too close. Just...too close.
I owe you. Seriously.
Almost a dead bird walking.
Just...hold on!
Medic? Support? Anyone?!
We need a triage! NOW!
...Okay, that was pretty good.
Doesn't even feel like a fight anymore.
Look at you go!
Was that really necessary, doctor?
What did you even do?
That's one way of raising the stakes...
I see now why the Coven were interested in you.
You would've been a good Primarch.
Got any other tricks up your sleeve?
Don't waste my time.
I'm not taking a deadend job!
That isn't a military operation. It just isn't.
That's a bit ambitious...
What is this? A suicide mission?
I request reassignment.
The Coven had similar methods.
Another one to dissect my brain?
Better than a naturopath session, I suppose.
If it makes you happy, fine.
Let's just get this over with.
What's wrong with me this time?
Am I the problem? Or is it something else?
Always gets the heart pumping!
Never afraid to dirty my talons.
No pain, no gain.
Not a bad way to preen.
Brynn would've liked this place.
Reminds me of a simpler time.
Never a religious bird, but...
I have a lot to atone for.
A coinpurse if you can beat me in a shooting contest!
Always had a soft spot for the card games.
You've got some neat looking chips.
I'd kill for a pint. Literally.
Anyone up for a drinking contest?
Cheers!
Got any meat as a side? Preferably raw.
Just setup a tab for me.
You remind me of...nevermind.
Don't worry. I'll be gentle.
I'll do you right. I promise.
Think you can handle this much bird?
Not interesting.
I can sit around in town for free, you know.
Meditation? This is a waste of time!
Why does this even cost money?
Quite frankly, the feeling is mutual.
Where did you even find that thing?
You call me an animal, but accept that thing?
Back, you feathered fiend! I see through your deception!
Fools, all of you! He is but a bird spy!
Why is he even allowed to be here?! He's the enemy!
Oh, and you'll defend him when he starts pecking at all of us?!

She was right. I am better than this.

Deep breathing. Just like she taught me.
Calm under pressure. I can do this.
I have everything to lose — and everything to gain.
I don't fear. I have ammo.
Take heart — this eagle believes in you.
Look at me. We have this. We always did.
I never miss my mark.
I have one job, and I'll be damned if I fail it now.
Clear your mind. You are the predator. They are the prey.
And now you will see as I see.
No more games. It's time to put them down.
Enough playing around. Now we go for the kill.
One at a time. Grind the weak links down and they'll crumble.

I was born to survive, and raised to adapt.
In weakness, there is strength. In toil, there is power.
This is what I live for. This is what I was meant to do.
They gave me an inch — and now I'll take the mile.
...Worse than anything I dealt with in the Coven.
I knew this was going to be a suicide mission...
I don't desert, but I wouldn't blame anyone for wanting to.
How many have we slain? And yet this hellpit spits more out!
This isn't a retreat. Promise.
I just...my gun is better in the back.
I just...I need a moment to reload!
*Fumbling the gun*
Nothing is safe here. We're fooling ourselves.
We've hardly secured a perimeter. How can we expect safety?
*Hyperventilating*
...Too much. We need to pull out.
Gambling like this was a mistake.
...Biggest fluke I've ever seen.
We're way more outmatched than I thought.
Our chances just went from bad to worse.
Hard to muster up the courage, isn't it?
Thought that would be lethal, if I'm being honest.
Better you than me, really.
You're a lot bolder than I am.
I just...can't. I'm sorry.
No! That would open up the flank!
I just...don't have the mindset for this right now.
No good. My heads not in it.
I CAN'T HANDLE IT ANYMORE!
...Joining up with you lot was a mistake.
If you can't fight, you will be made to fight.
Be glad I am so tolerant. The Coven were far harsher than this.
A bullet for anyone who deserts.
I am the officer at rank. You will not question me.
I don't take orders from you.
By all means, rest. But tomorrow morning we're waking early.
Drop and give me 20. If you complain, I'll up it to 50.
The fact that I even have to do this speaks volumes.
Fight harder. I'll give you a taste of what'll happen if you don't.
Not enough. More.
Hmph. Good.
The Coven would have shot you for that.
Time to own up. No excuses.
Gentle reminder that incompetence will be punished.
Saves me the effort of motivating you myself.
I think you'll do far better remaining right where you are.
Word to the wise: the Commander has rights to any position.
Quiet. My patience has been exhausted as is.
Word to the wise: you do not ask things of your Commander.
Does it look like I want your help?
If I had need of you, I would've asked.
DESERTERS, ALL OF YOU! I WILL—
So, how much did the Coven pay you this time?
Should've known my actions would have consequences...
Even if none of you are traitors, I'm not taking chances.
If you out yourself as the plant, I promise I'll make it quick.
Bear with me, please. My trust is thin as is.
Why are you so concerned about my position all of a sudden?
Better I do this than get stabbed in the back.
I would help, but I need to keep my eyes open for the time being.
Unpredictability is the only way to ensure my survival.
Can't listen to you this time. Sorry.
Disturb me in my sleep at your own peril.
There will be investigation tonight. Mark my words.
The gig is up, traitor.
You almost fooled me. Almost.
False ambush? A standard tactic of the Coven.
Definitely not. I've seen this happen before.
Real smart, forcing me in the middle of two sides.
If you want to earn my trust, start covering me!
How deep does this conspiracy go, I wonder?
Was that intentional? No, can't be...
If they're in on it too...
Is everyone in it? Or were you just lucky?
If you think you're fooling anyone, you're stupid.
Hard to separate incompetence from conspiracy, to be honest.
I trust you. And that means they're after you too.
Careful. The plant might not just be here for me.
I trust you. But they still might use the opportunity.
Not now. The risk of betrayal is too great.
I'll make do without. The risk is too high.
Given the current situation, I cannot accept.
Some naturopaths did specialize in slow release poisons...
I was getting along just fine, thank you very much.
...I could use a hand. But I'm not sure if I can trust you.
What was that behind your back?
I cannot afford a distraction. Not at this time.
Not now. I need to keep my eyes open.
Stop. I asked you earlier to back off.
You are more eager to help than is comfortable for me.
I would like you to try a bite first.
Feh. Even if not poisoned, human food never takes well.
THE COVEN COMES FOR ME AT LAST!
I was in need of a preen anyway.
Paint my feathers red. I can take it.
You lot are younger. It's better if I take the blows.
You stop caring after the 100th scar.
If a feather gets stuck in your equipment, I apologise.
I'm not an artist, but painting the walls with blood does sound appealling.
It's about time I did my part.
I have a blade. I can afford to get into melee.
Let's toy with them. I'm actually enjoying this.
We're so far ahead. We can afford a little chaos.
*Screeching in pain and pleasure*
Could someone spare a blade? These feathers need to go.
Slip behind them. I'll draw their fire.
*Warcaw* At me, you fools! I'm not afraid!
*Picking at own feathers*
Just need to get the blood pumping...
I don't desert.
We'll have to fight them again later. Why bother?
*Amused Caw* Go on. Try me again.
It's a proper bloodbath now!
*Sigh* I suppose it's reaching to expect much from these brutes.
I am not disappointed! Just...expecting more.
Why flinch? It doesn't look that bad.
I think you spilt blood on me. I don't mind.
I see the need to move. But I think we're far enough as is.
No need. Our positioning is optimal.
We're ahead. Use it when we aren't.
Save it. These wounds will scar anyway.
If we were actually in trouble, I would accept.
I appreciate it. But I don't need it.
I commend your eagerness, but I can make do.
Someone else might need it. Don't worry about me.
I asked for a blade, not a bandage!
No thanks. I'm in the middle of a good preen.
...Sorry, but not this time. It isn't necessary.
We can get by. You don't need my help.
Gone without food plenty when I was still with the Coven.
...What was my record for fasting? Eight days?
I PUSHED IT TOO FAR!
I don't do this for money. But with that said...
I am your Commander. Remember that.
Know your betters and fall in line, soldiers.
As Commander, I am entitled to double share.
Let me by. My blade is sufficient.
They are vulnerable! Charge!
Let me back. My gun is sufficient.
It is unwise to leave your Commander in the front.
If you had more experience, you would follow my lead.
One second. I must consider our strategy...
Quiet! It is not your place to command me.
My strategy hinges on this move!
Where is our tent? I need a war room to plan!
Where is my share? You know of my experience!
What is this? Our formation is sloppy!
The Coven would be appalled at this treatment of authority!
Very good. I see my oversight has paid off.
Excellent. Much better than your fellows.
I see my experience is still needed.
Looks like you need a few days of Coven training.
What is this? My authority supersedes yours!
I don't normally pull rank, but you must learn your place.
WHY ARE YOU LEAVING ME? I NEED-
I threw it all away...and I still lost her, in the end.
Will I ever see her again? Is there ever a good ending?
I could've had a happy life. Better than dying in this pit...
...I wish I was never here. That none of this ever happened.
Not much left to do, except die on the frontline.
Anywhere my talons can carry me. Not that it matters.
Maybe I'll shoot them from the back. Maybe.
Does it even matter anymore?
Hard to fight a war you no longer believe in.
Biggest lie I told myself was that I was doing this for her.
I have no strategy. Other than to die.
The tactics, the plans, the strategy...it didn't matter. It never did.
It's so cold, sleeping without her.
I'll never see her again, will I? You don't need to lie to me.
Maybe I'll buy you some time. Maybe.
Time for my last stand.
Everything hurts. But not as much as losing her.
She would be ashamed to see me again, wouldn't she? I can't...
Win or lose, I don't want to run.
No point. No point in any of it, really.
There's nothing left. Not for me.
I can't pretend to care anymore.
No more. The fight's been kicked out of me.
I can't get back up. I can't go on.
Why are you still helping me? Why fight on?
I'm sorry. I won't.
I'm not in the mindset. Not sure if I ever will be again.
I can't muster. I wish I could.
Leave me alone! I don't want this anymore.
I know you believe in me. But you shouldn't.
She was such a good cook...but I'll never taste it again.
I'm empty. But not because of the food.
I DON'T CARE ANYMORE!
What is this? Where is Shepard?
Where am I? This isn't Palaven. Or the Normandy.
Who are you people? And where are we?
What year is it? All of this technology is antiquated!
...Feathers? What is this? I'm not myself!
I'm just trying to find my way. Let me forward.
I'll take the front, I suppose.
This thing isn't a sniper, but I suppose it'll do.
If Virmire was any indication, I should not be in melee.
I can't get a handle on this outdated gun!
Gun's overheated. Can't risk firing.
Do I have to listen to everything? Shepard gave us agency...
I've never been a particularly good Turian.
I'm not supposed to be here. I need to find Shepard.
...Why do I have a beak? Where are my mandibles?
Suppose I might as well jump into the fray.
Reminds me of Omega, all those mercs coming after me...
Is this a dream? If so...
I don't even know you. And you've been leering at me.
This must be a nightmare. Only one way to wake up.
Here's hoping I'm just asleep on the Normandy.
This is a good defensive position. Why give it up?
I wasn't a coward then, and I won't be now.
No shields? Oh. Right.
Kinetic barriers haven't been invented yet, have they?
These fighting tactics are different, too.
Every dodge is a gamble. I hate that.
Not Turian Military, but I respect the effort.
Heh. You remind me of Wrex.
I miss Shepard already...
Reminds me of Jack's aim. But you don't have the biotics.
No medigel? That stings.
Took a rocket to the face once, you know.
Almost looked like you had a barrier up.
Almost textbook. Except the year isn't 2185.
From where I come from, teammates don't ask for my position.
Really? Does the sharpshooter not get monopoly on position?
What is that? Not used to it all being outdated...
Is that even sanitized properly? Is any of this?
Not medigel? Then it won't help.
Medical standards really have fallen, haven't they?
The only help I need is to find my way out of here!
How exactly does this help? I geninuely don't know.
No time. I'm busy figuring out how this gun works.
...Why are you asking me to do that? I don't know how.
These aren't dextro rations!
Risking a reaction now wouldn't be wise.
I CAN'T GO ON WITHOUT YOU, SHEPARD!

БОЕВАЯ ПРОВИЗИЯ

Невероятно эффективен, Арбитр владеет винтовкой, пистолетом и клинком. Он специализируется на удержании средних рангов, отдавая фронт своим союзникам. Когда ничего не остаётся, помните: достать пистолет быстрее, чем перезаряжаться

Арбитр владеет универсальным арсеналом. Его винтовка идеально себя показывает на средней дистанции, а его верный клинок поможет пережить более близкие контакты. Когда ничего не остаётся, помните: достать пистолет быстрее, чем перезаряжаться
Запасливый и, на удивление, разговорчивый, Арбитр может помочь союзникам, упаковывая припасы, рассказывая истории и его несломимая воля всегда будет примером для его союзников.
Сколько стоит пушка?
Не продаётся
Винтажный Специальный набор
Привет, профессор!
Наконец нашли меня, я погляжу
Гаррус и Врэкс
Врэкс и Гаррус
Ударный отряд Ковенанта
Шоу Пушек
Большие пушки
Стрельба по мишеням
Заптичаемся
Освящённые и Посвящённые
Ровно в полдень!
Ровно в полдень!
Сердце мира. Всё, что хотел Ковенант. Но оно умрёт со мной.
Я горю!
Дым выжигает мои глаза!
*Стонет и щебечет*
Война, которую я веду - бесцельна...
...Бринн?
Я скучал, любовь моя.
Я так бы хотел, чтобы у нас было больше времени вместе...
Моя любовь не для тебя, ведьма!
Как смеешь ты издеваться над этими чувствами!
Больше без игр.
Чёртовы стервятники...
... Это было больнее, чем я ожидал.
Без обид, верно?
... Мы всегда были так похожи?
... Так вот, каково это.
Прошу прощения за это, сэр.
Бринн?.. Увидимся ли мы снова?
... Трудно это перенести, даже когда это ожидаемо.
Я всегда беру с запасом. Всегда.
Я видел, как истекли кровью многие мои друзья. Не присоединяйся к ним.
Не бывает слишком много припасов. Не когда идёт война.
Нора их носила... Интересно, что с ней стало?..
Они были неправы во многих вещах. Но они знали как драться.
Они растили меня с рождения. Нужно было вытрясти некоторые из их уроков
Если убрать некоторые доктрины, их тактики становятся гениальными.
Зрелл многому научил меня. Интересно, как бы он посмотрел на меня сейчас...
Побит и помят, но не сломлен.
В войне нет гордости. Только карабканье после падения.
Никто не неприкосновенен. И я не буду делать вид, что я неприкосновенен.
Давай расскажу тебе историю...
Нора. Фелнум. Зориэль. Они были моими товарищами...
Почему я здесь? Железный кулак и давно ожидаемое предательство.
... Только Нора выжила. Мы объединились вскоре после.
Уйти из Ковенанта было моим лучшим решением.
...Я был лишь инструментом для них. Но я знал слишком много.
Давай поспорим. Кто убьёт десятерых?
А, шрам на моём клюве? Конечно, я расскажу...
Ты бы понравился Бринн... Как же я по ней скучаю...
Я предпочитаю отрывать пластырь, потерпи.
Не лучшая помощь, но должно помочь.
Легче принести вред, чем вылечить. Я признаю.
Помоги мне зарядить обоймы, это поможет отвлечься.
Твои опасения рациональны. Наша работа нелегка...
Поговори со мной. Меньшее, что я могу сделать, это выслушать.
Я знал, что делаю правильный выбор, присоединяясь к вам, ребята.
Это лучше, чем обычная вылазка Ковенанта. Считайте, я впечатлён.
Когда вернёмся в Гамлет, я угощаю.
Я не верю в предупредительные выстрелы.
Тук-тук! Пришёл большой злой орёл!
Прицелься и попади.
Давай по-простому.
Сядь и не вставай.
Поцарапал одного!
Прицелился - убил!
У этой птички есть пушка!
Пометьте и убейте!
Враги заходят с фланга!
Они пытаются прорвать наши ряды!
Я вне позиции!
Держать строй!
Оружие на готове.
Глаза открыты.
Держать строй.
Глаза щиплет...
Прощаемся с любимым одеянием...
Химическая атака!
Мне нужна помощь!
Если пушка не заедает...
Кровь свернётся... Когда-нибудь.
Нужно держать палец на курке сухим...
И сразу пятно. Фантастика.
*Скрежещет зубами*
Худший аспект войны.
Реально?.. Просто... Реально?
Фантастика. То, что было нужно.
Пусть в следующий раз это сделает кто-нибудь ещё, а?
О, это было приятно.
Интересно сверкает...
Нечто стоящее. Наконец.

Provisões de Combate

Implacavelmente eficiente e perigosamente eficaz, o Árbitro se destaca em cortar as fileiras medianas, empunhando rifle, pistola e lâmina para fazer o trabalho. E, se seus aliados vacilarem, ele sabe como manter a linha.

O Árbitro veste um uniforme decorado e usa um arsenal versátil. Seu rifle repetidor é excelente a média distância, e uma lâmina confiável lida com os encontros próximos. E quando tudo mais falha, trocar para uma pistola é mais rápido do que recarregar.
Recurso e surpreendentemente sociável, o Árbitro faz bom uso do seu descanso. Levando provisões, histórias e um espírito indomável, qualquer equipe apreciará sua experiência.

Coven Tactics
Reminisce
Combat Provisions

Callously efficient and dangerously effective, the Arbiter excels at cutting down the middling ranks, wielding rifle, pistol and blade to get the job done. And should his allies falter, he knows how to hold the line.

The Arbiter dons a decorated uniform and uses a versatile arsenal. His repeater rifle excels at medium range, and a trusty blade handles the close encounters. And when all else fails, switching to a pistol is faster than reloading.
Resourceful and surprisingly social, the Arbiter makes good use of his respite. Packing provisions, stories and an indomitable spirit, any team will appreciate his expertise.
How much for the gun?
It's not for sale.

Blessed And Possessed
Draw!
Draw!
The heart of the world. Everything the Coven wanted. But it'll die with me.
My uniform is on fire!
The smoke is burning my eyes!
*Struggling and screeching*
The war I wage is empty...
...Brynn?
I missed you, my love.
I wish we had more time together...
My love is not reserved for you, hag!
How dare you draw on those feelings!
No more mind games.
Damn vultures...
...That was more painful than I expected.
No hard feelings, right?
...Have we always looked so alike?
...So that's how it feels.
Sorry for this, sir.
Brynn...will I ever see you again?
...Hard to handle even when you know it's coming.
I always bring extra. Always.
I've seen too many friends bleed to death. Don't join them.
Never too many supplies. Not when war is involved.
Nora used to carry these. Wonder how she's doing...
They were wrong about many things. But not about how to fight.
They raised me from birth. Hard to shake some of those lessons.
Cut the indoctrination, and some of their tactics were brilliant.
Zrell taught me much. Wonder how he'd see me now...
Bruised and battered, but not broken.
There is no pride in war. Only getting back up after being kicked down.
No one is untouchable. And I won't pretend that I am.
Let me tell you a story.
Nora. Felnum. Zuriel. Those were my squadmates.
The reason I'm here? An iron fist, and a long awaited betrayal.
...Only Nora survived the aftermath. We parted soon after.
Leaving the Coven was the best thing that ever happened to me.
...I was but a tool to them. But I knew too much.
How about a wager? First to ten kills?
This scar on my beak? Sure, I can talk about it.
Brynn would have liked you. Oh how I miss her...
I prefer to rip the bandaid. Sorry if this hurts.
Not the greatest patch job, but it should hold for now.
Easier to hurt than heal, I'll admit.
Help me load my magazines — it'll take your mind off things.
Your concerns are valid. Our line of work isn't easy...
Talk to me. The least I can do is listen.
Knew it was the right choice to join up with you lot.
Better than a standard Coven mission. Consider me impressed.
Once we get back to the Hamlet, drinks are on me.
I don't believe in warning shots.
Knock knock - it's the big bad eagle.
Take your shot and make it count.
Let's keep this simple.
Sit down and stay down.
Scratch one!
Scoped and dropped!
This fowl has a firearm.
Tag 'em and bag 'em!
We're being flanked!
They're trying to break ranks!
I'm out of position!
Hold the line!
Weapons free.
Eyes open.
Stay in formation.
My eyes hurt.
There goes the uniform...
Watch the chemical warfare!
I need treatment!
So long as it doesn't jam the gun...
It'll clot...eventually.
Need to keep a dry trigger finger...
Stained right up. Fantastic.
*Grits teeth*
The worst part of war.
Really? Just...really?
Fantastic. Just what I needed.
Can someone else do it next time?
Oh, that felt nice.
Does have a nice shine to it...
Something worth the trek. Finally.
I've got a pounding headache.
Need to get a grip...
Steady. Just...steady.
Just need to...walk it off.
Bloody hell, that hurt.
*Coughing blood*
Lean on me if you have to.
We've got wounded!
Are you clear?
Every war ends...
Don't...don't let me sit down.
I can't...I can't breathe...
Too close. Just...too close.
I owe you. Seriously.
Almost a dead bird walking.
Just...hold on!
Medic? Support? Anyone?!
We need a triage! NOW!
...Okay, that was pretty good.
Doesn't even feel like a fight anymore.
Look at you go!
Was that really necessary, doctor?
What did you even do?
That's one way of raising the stakes...
I see now why the Coven were interested in you.
You would've been a good Primarch.
Got any other tricks up your sleeve?
Don't waste my time.
I'm not taking a deadend job!
That isn't a military operation. It just isn't.
That's a bit ambitious...
What is this? A suicide mission?
I request reassignment.
The Coven had similar methods.
Another one to dissect my brain?
Better than a naturopath session, I suppose.
If it makes you happy, fine.
Let's just get this over with.
What's wrong with me this time?
Am I the problem? Or is it something else?
Always gets the heart pumping!
Never afraid to dirty my talons.
No pain, no gain.
Not a bad way to preen.
Brynn would've liked this place.
Reminds me of a simpler time.
Never a religious bird, but...
I have a lot to atone for.
A coinpurse if you can beat me in a shooting contest!
Always had a soft spot for the card games.
You've got some neat looking chips.
I'd kill for a pint. Literally.
Anyone up for a drinking contest?
Cheers!
Got any meat as a side? Preferably raw.
Just setup a tab for me.
You remind me of...nevermind.
Don't worry. I'll be gentle.
I'll do you right. I promise.
Think you can handle this much bird?
Not interesting.
I can sit around in town for free, you know.
Meditation? This is a waste of time!
Why does this even cost money?
Quite frankly, the feeling is mutual.
Where did you even find that thing?
You call me an animal, but accept that thing?
Back, you feathered fiend! I see through your deception!
Fools, all of you! He is but a bird spy!
Why is he even allowed to be here?! He's the enemy!
Oh, and you'll defend him when he starts pecking at all of us?!

Paragon Feather
I'm sorry, Brynn.
Stopping power doesn't come cheap.
Lucky he bailed me out.
A good holster makes all the difference.
No mercy.
Potent, but horrible recoil.
Have we always looked so alike?
Embrace the infinite chorus...
Unblemished, despite everything.
When Hit:
She was right. I am better than this.
She believed in me. And she was right.
Deep breathing. Just like she taught me.
Calm under pressure. I can do this.
I have everything to lose — and everything to gain.
I don't fear. I have ammo.
Take heart — this eagle believes in you.
Look at me. We have this. We always did.
I never miss my mark.
I have one job, and I'll be damned if I fail it now.
Clear your mind. You are the predator. They are the prey.
And now you will see as I see.
No more games. It's time to put them down.
Enough playing around. Now we go for the kill.
One at a time. Grind the weak links down and they'll crumble.
We are the top of the food chain. It's high time we started acting like it.
I was born to survive, and raised to adapt.
In weakness, there is strength. In toil, there is power.
This is what I live for. This is what I was meant to do.
They gave me an inch — and now I'll take the mile.
...Worse than anything I dealt with in the Coven.
I knew this was going to be a suicide mission...
I don't desert, but I wouldn't blame anyone for wanting to.
How many have we slain? And yet this hellpit spits more out!
This isn't a retreat. Promise.
I just...my gun is better in the back.
I just...I need a moment to reload!
*Fumbling the gun*
Nothing is safe here. We're fooling ourselves.
We've hardly secured a perimeter. How can we expect safety?
*Hyperventilating*
...Too much. We need to pull out.
Gambling like this was a mistake.
...Biggest fluke I've ever seen.
We're way more outmatched than I thought.
Our chances just went from bad to worse.
Hard to muster up the courage, isn't it?
Thought that would be lethal, if I'm being honest.
Better you than me, really.
You're a lot bolder than I am.
I just...can't. I'm sorry.
No! That would open up the flank!
I just...don't have the mindset for this right now.
No good. My heads not in it.
I CAN'T HANDLE IT ANYMORE!
...Joining up with you lot was a mistake.
If you can't fight, you will be made to fight.
Be glad I am so tolerant. The Coven were far harsher than this.
A bullet for anyone who deserts.
I am the officer at rank. You will not question me.
I don't take orders from you.
By all means, rest. But tomorrow morning we're waking early.
Drop and give me 20. If you complain, I'll up it to 50.
The fact that I even have to do this speaks volumes.
Fight harder. I'll give you a taste of what'll happen if you don't.
Not enough. More.
Hmph. Good.
The Coven would have shot you for that.
Time to own up. No excuses.
Gentle reminder that incompetence will be punished.
Saves me the effort of motivating you myself.
I think you'll do far better remaining right where you are.
Word to the wise: the Commander has rights to any position.
Quiet. My patience has been exhausted as is.
Word to the wise: you do not ask things of your Commander.
Does it look like I want your help?
If I had need of you, I would've asked.
DESERTERS, ALL OF YOU! I WILL—
So, how much did the Coven pay you this time?
Should've known my actions would have consequences...
Even if none of you are traitors, I'm not taking chances.
If you out yourself as the plant, I promise I'll make it quick.
Bear with me, please. My trust is thin as is.
Why are you so concerned about my position all of a sudden?
Better I do this than get stabbed in the back.
I would help, but I need to keep my eyes open for the time being.
Unpredictability is the only way to ensure my survival.
Can't listen to you this time. Sorry.
Disturb me in my sleep at your own peril.
There will be investigation tonight. Mark my words.
The gig is up, traitor.
You almost fooled me. Almost.
False ambush? A standard tactic of the Coven.
Definitely not. I've seen this happen before.
Real smart, forcing me in the middle of two sides.
If you want to earn my trust, start covering me!
How deep does this conspiracy go, I wonder?
Was that intentional? No, can't be...
If they're in on it too...
Is everyone in it? Or were you just lucky?
If you think you're fooling anyone, you're stupid.
Hard to separate incompetence from conspiracy, to be honest.
I trust you. And that means they're after you too.
Careful. The plant might not just be here for me.
I trust you. But they still might use the opportunity.
Not now. The risk of betrayal is too great.
I'll make do without. The risk is too high.
Given the current situation, I cannot accept.
Some naturopaths did specialize in slow release poisons...
I was getting along just fine, thank you very much.
...I could use a hand. But I'm not sure if I can trust you.
What was that behind your back?
I cannot afford a distraction. Not at this time.
Not now. I need to keep my eyes open.
Stop. I asked you earlier to back off.
You are more eager to help than is comfortable for me.
I would like you to try a bite first.
Feh. Even if not poisoned, human food never takes well.
THE COVEN COMES FOR ME AT LAST!
I was in need of a preen anyway.
Paint my feathers red. I can take it.
You lot are younger. It's better if I take the blows.
You stop caring after the 100th scar.
If a feather gets stuck in your equipment, I apologise.
I'm not an artist, but painting the walls with blood does sound appealling.
It's about time I did my part.
I have a blade. I can afford to get into melee.
Let's toy with them. I'm actually enjoying this.
We're so far ahead. We can afford a little chaos.
*Screeching in pain and pleasure*
Could someone spare a blade? These feathers need to go.
Slip behind them. I'll draw their fire.
*Warcaw* At me, you fools! I'm not afraid!
*Picking at own feathers*
Just need to get the blood pumping...
I don't desert.
We'll have to fight them again later. Why bother?
*Amused Caw* Go on. Try me again.
It's a proper bloodbath now!
*Sigh* I suppose it's reaching to expect much from these brutes.
I am not disappointed! Just...expecting more.
Why flinch? It doesn't look that bad.
I think you spilt blood on me. I don't mind.
I see the need to move. But I think we're far enough as is.
No need. Our positioning is optimal.
We're ahead. Use it when we aren't.
Save it. These wounds will scar anyway.
If we were actually in trouble, I would accept.
I appreciate it. But I don't need it.
I commend your eagerness, but I can make do.
Someone else might need it. Don't worry about me.
I asked for a blade, not a bandage!
No thanks. I'm in the middle of a good preen.
...Sorry, but not this time. It isn't necessary.
We can get by. You don't need my help.
Gone without food plenty when I was still with the Coven.
...What was my record for fasting? Eight days?
I PUSHED IT TOO FAR!
I don't do this for money. But with that said...
I am your Commander. Remember that.
Know your betters and fall in line, soldiers.
As Commander, I am entitled to double share.
Let me by. My blade is sufficient.
They are vulnerable! Charge!
Let me back. My gun is sufficient.
It is unwise to leave your Commander in the front.
If you had more experience, you would follow my lead.
One second. I must consider our strategy...
Quiet! It is not your place to command me.
My strategy hinges on this move!
Where is our tent? I need a war room to plan!
Where is my share? You know of my experience!
What is this? Our formation is sloppy!
The Coven would be appalled at this treatment of authority!
Very good. I see my oversight has paid off.
Excellent. Much better than your fellows.
I see my experience is still needed.
Looks like you need a few days of Coven training.
What is this? My authority supersedes yours!
I don't normally pull rank, but you must learn your place.
WHY ARE YOU LEAVING ME? I NEED-
I threw it all away...and I still lost her, in the end.
Will I ever see her again? Is there ever a good ending?
I could've had a happy life. Better than dying in this pit...
...I wish I was never here. That none of this ever happened.
Not much left to do, except die on the frontline.
Anywhere my talons can carry me. Not that it matters.
Maybe I'll shoot them from the back. Maybe.
Does it even matter anymore?
Hard to fight a war you no longer believe in.
Biggest lie I told myself was that I was doing this for her.
I have no strategy. Other than to die.
The tactics, the plans, the strategy...it didn't matter. It never did.
It's so cold, sleeping without her.
I'll never see her again, will I? You don't need to lie to me.
Maybe I'll buy you some time. Maybe.
Time for my last stand.
Everything hurts. But not as much as losing her.
She would be ashamed to see me again, wouldn't she? I can't...
Win or lose, I don't want to run.
No point. No point in any of it, really.
There's nothing left. Not for me.
I can't pretend to care anymore.
No more. The fight's been kicked out of me.
I can't get back up. I can't go on.
Why are you still helping me? Why fight on?
I'm sorry. I won't.
I'm not in the mindset. Not sure if I ever will be again.
I can't muster. I wish I could.
Leave me alone! I don't want this anymore.
I know you believe in me. But you shouldn't.
She was such a good cook...but I'll never taste it again.
I'm empty. But not because of the food.
I DON'T CARE ANYMORE!
What is this? Where is Shepard?
Where am I? This isn't Palaven. Or the Normandy.
Who are you people? And where are we?
What year is it? All of this technology is antiquated!
...Feathers? What is this? I'm not myself!
I'm just trying to find my way. Let me forward.
I'll take the front, I suppose.
This thing isn't a sniper, but I suppose it'll do.
If Virmire was any indication, I should not be in melee.
I can't get a handle on this outdated gun!
Gun's overheated. Can't risk firing.
Do I have to listen to everything? Shepard gave us agency...
I've never been a particularly good Turian.
I'm not supposed to be here. I need to find Shepard.
...Why do I have a beak? Where are my mandibles?
Suppose I might as well jump into the fray.
Reminds me of Omega, all those mercs coming after me...
Is this a dream? If so...
I don't even know you. And you've been leering at me.
This must be a nightmare. Only one way to wake up.
Here's hoping I'm just asleep on the Normandy.
This is a good defensive position. Why give it up?
I wasn't a coward then, and I won't be now.
No shields? Oh. Right.
Kinetic barriers haven't been invented yet, have they?
These fighting tactics are different, too.
Every dodge is a gamble. I hate that.
Not Turian Military, but I respect the effort.
Heh. You remind me of Wrex.
I miss Shepard already...
Reminds me of Jack's aim. But you don't have the biotics.
No medigel? That stings.
Took a rocket to the face once, you know.
Almost looked like you had a barrier up.
Almost textbook. Except the year isn't 2185.
From where I come from, teammates don't ask for my position.
Really? Does the sharpshooter not get monopoly on position?
What is that? Not used to it all being outdated...
Is that even sanitized properly? Is any of this?
Not medigel? Then it won't help.
Medical standards really have fallen, haven't they?
The only help I need is to find my way out of here!
How exactly does this help? I geninuely don't know.
No time. I'm busy figuring out how this gun works.
...Why are you asking me to do that? I don't know how.
These aren't dextro rations!
Risking a reaction now wouldn't be wise.
I CAN'T GO ON WITHOUT YOU, SHEPARD!

Coven Tactics
Reminisce
Combat Provisions

Callously efficient and dangerously effective, the Arbiter excels at cutting down the middling ranks, wielding rifle, pistol and blade to get the job done. And should his allies falter, he knows how to hold the line.

The Arbiter dons a decorated uniform and uses a versatile arsenal. His repeater rifle excels at medium range, and a trusty blade handles the close encounters. And when all else fails, switching to a pistol is faster than reloading.
Resourceful and surprisingly social, the Arbiter makes good use of his respite. Packing provisions, stories and an indomitable spirit, any team will appreciate his expertise.
How much for the gun?
It's not for sale.

Blessed And Possessed
Draw!
Draw!
The heart of the world. Everything the Coven wanted. But it'll die with me.
My uniform is on fire!
The smoke is burning my eyes!
*Struggling and screeching*
The war I wage is empty...
...Brynn?
I missed you, my love.
I wish we had more time together...
My love is not reserved for you, hag!
How dare you draw on those feelings!
No more mind games.
Damn vultures...
...That was more painful than I expected.
No hard feelings, right?
...Have we always looked so alike?
...So that's how it feels.
Sorry for this, sir.
Brynn...will I ever see you again?
...Hard to handle even when you know it's coming.
I always bring extra. Always.
I've seen too many friends bleed to death. Don't join them.
Never too many supplies. Not when war is involved.
Nora used to carry these. Wonder how she's doing...
They were wrong about many things. But not about how to fight.
They raised me from birth. Hard to shake some of those lessons.
Cut the indoctrination, and some of their tactics were brilliant.
Zrell taught me much. Wonder how he'd see me now...
Bruised and battered, but not broken.
There is no pride in war. Only getting back up after being kicked down.
No one is untouchable. And I won't pretend that I am.
Let me tell you a story.
Nora. Felnum. Zuriel. Those were my squadmates.
The reason I'm here? An iron fist, and a long awaited betrayal.
...Only Nora survived the aftermath. We parted soon after.
Leaving the Coven was the best thing that ever happened to me.
...I was but a tool to them. But I knew too much.
How about a wager? First to ten kills?
This scar on my beak? Sure, I can talk about it.
Brynn would have liked you. Oh how I miss her...
I prefer to rip the bandaid. Sorry if this hurts.
Not the greatest patch job, but it should hold for now.
Easier to hurt than heal, I'll admit.
Help me load my magazines — it'll take your mind off things.
Your concerns are valid. Our line of work isn't easy...
Talk to me. The least I can do is listen.
Knew it was the right choice to join up with you lot.
Better than a standard Coven mission. Consider me impressed.
Once we get back to the Hamlet, drinks are on me.
I don't believe in warning shots.
Knock knock - it's the big bad eagle.
Take your shot and make it count.
Let's keep this simple.
Sit down and stay down.
Scratch one!
Scoped and dropped!
This fowl has a firearm.
Tag 'em and bag 'em!
We're being flanked!
They're trying to break ranks!
I'm out of position!
Hold the line!
Weapons free.
Eyes open.
Stay in formation.
My eyes hurt.
There goes the uniform...
Watch the chemical warfare!
I need treatment!
So long as it doesn't jam the gun...
It'll clot...eventually.
Need to keep a dry trigger finger...
Stained right up. Fantastic.
*Grits teeth*
The worst part of war.
Really? Just...really?
Fantastic. Just what I needed.
Can someone else do it next time?
Oh, that felt nice.
Does have a nice shine to it...
Something worth the trek. Finally.
I've got a pounding headache.
Need to get a grip...
Steady. Just...steady.
Just need to...walk it off.
Bloody hell, that hurt.
*Coughing blood*
Lean on me if you have to.
We've got wounded!
Are you clear?
Every war ends...
Don't...don't let me sit down.
I can't...I can't breathe...
Too close. Just...too close.
I owe you. Seriously.
Almost a dead bird walking.
Just...hold on!
Medic? Support? Anyone?!
We need a triage! NOW!
...Okay, that was pretty good.
Doesn't even feel like a fight anymore.
Look at you go!
Was that really necessary, doctor?
What did you even do?
That's one way of raising the stakes...
I see now why the Coven were interested in you.
You would've been a good Primarch.
Got any other tricks up your sleeve?
Don't waste my time.
I'm not taking a deadend job!
That isn't a military operation. It just isn't.
That's a bit ambitious...
What is this? A suicide mission?
I request reassignment.
The Coven had similar methods.
Another one to dissect my brain?
Better than a naturopath session, I suppose.
If it makes you happy, fine.
Let's just get this over with.
What's wrong with me this time?
Am I the problem? Or is it something else?
Always gets the heart pumping!
Never afraid to dirty my talons.
No pain, no gain.
Not a bad way to preen.
Brynn would've liked this place.
Reminds me of a simpler time.
Never a religious bird, but...
I have a lot to atone for.
A coinpurse if you can beat me in a shooting contest!
Always had a soft spot for the card games.
You've got some neat looking chips.
I'd kill for a pint. Literally.
Anyone up for a drinking contest?
Cheers!
Got any meat as a side? Preferably raw.
Just setup a tab for me.
You remind me of...nevermind.
Don't worry. I'll be gentle.
I'll do you right. I promise.
Think you can handle this much bird?
Not interesting.
I can sit around in town for free, you know.
Meditation? This is a waste of time!
Why does this even cost money?
Quite frankly, the feeling is mutual.
Where did you even find that thing?
You call me an animal, but accept that thing?
Back, you feathered fiend! I see through your deception!
Fools, all of you! He is but a bird spy!
Why is he even allowed to be here?! He's the enemy!
Oh, and you'll defend him when he starts pecking at all of us?!

Paragon Feather
I'm sorry, Brynn.
Stopping power doesn't come cheap.
Lucky he bailed me out.
A good holster makes all the difference.
No mercy.
Potent, but horrible recoil.
Have we always looked so alike?
Embrace the infinite chorus...
Unblemished, despite everything.
When Hit:
She was right. I am better than this.
She believed in me. And she was right.
Deep breathing. Just like she taught me.
Calm under pressure. I can do this.
I have everything to lose — and everything to gain.
I don't fear. I have ammo.
Take heart — this eagle believes in you.
Look at me. We have this. We always did.
I never miss my mark.
I have one job, and I'll be damned if I fail it now.
Clear your mind. You are the predator. They are the prey.
And now you will see as I see.
No more games. It's time to put them down.
Enough playing around. Now we go for the kill.
One at a time. Grind the weak links down and they'll crumble.
We are the top of the food chain. It's high time we started acting like it.
I was born to survive, and raised to adapt.
In weakness, there is strength. In toil, there is power.
This is what I live for. This is what I was meant to do.
They gave me an inch — and now I'll take the mile.
...Worse than anything I dealt with in the Coven.
I knew this was going to be a suicide mission...
I don't desert, but I wouldn't blame anyone for wanting to.
How many have we slain? And yet this hellpit spits more out!
This isn't a retreat. Promise.
I just...my gun is better in the back.
I just...I need a moment to reload!
*Fumbling the gun*
Nothing is safe here. We're fooling ourselves.
We've hardly secured a perimeter. How can we expect safety?
*Hyperventilating*
...Too much. We need to pull out.
Gambling like this was a mistake.
...Biggest fluke I've ever seen.
We're way more outmatched than I thought.
Our chances just went from bad to worse.
Hard to muster up the courage, isn't it?
Thought that would be lethal, if I'm being honest.
Better you than me, really.
You're a lot bolder than I am.
I just...can't. I'm sorry.
No! That would open up the flank!
I just...don't have the mindset for this right now.
No good. My heads not in it.
I CAN'T HANDLE IT ANYMORE!
...Joining up with you lot was a mistake.
If you can't fight, you will be made to fight.
Be glad I am so tolerant. The Coven were far harsher than this.
A bullet for anyone who deserts.
I am the officer at rank. You will not question me.
I don't take orders from you.
By all means, rest. But tomorrow morning we're waking early.
Drop and give me 20. If you complain, I'll up it to 50.
The fact that I even have to do this speaks volumes.
Fight harder. I'll give you a taste of what'll happen if you don't.
Not enough. More.
Hmph. Good.
The Coven would have shot you for that.
Time to own up. No excuses.
Gentle reminder that incompetence will be punished.
Saves me the effort of motivating you myself.
I think you'll do far better remaining right where you are.
Word to the wise: the Commander has rights to any position.
Quiet. My patience has been exhausted as is.
Word to the wise: you do not ask things of your Commander.
Does it look like I want your help?
If I had need of you, I would've asked.
DESERTERS, ALL OF YOU! I WILL—
So, how much did the Coven pay you this time?
Should've known my actions would have consequences...
Even if none of you are traitors, I'm not taking chances.
If you out yourself as the plant, I promise I'll make it quick.
Bear with me, please. My trust is thin as is.
Why are you so concerned about my position all of a sudden?
Better I do this than get stabbed in the back.
I would help, but I need to keep my eyes open for the time being.
Unpredictability is the only way to ensure my survival.
Can't listen to you this time. Sorry.
Disturb me in my sleep at your own peril.
There will be investigation tonight. Mark my words.
The gig is up, traitor.
You almost fooled me. Almost.
False ambush? A standard tactic of the Coven.
Definitely not. I've seen this happen before.
Real smart, forcing me in the middle of two sides.
If you want to earn my trust, start covering me!
How deep does this conspiracy go, I wonder?
Was that intentional? No, can't be...
If they're in on it too...
Is everyone in it? Or were you just lucky?
If you think you're fooling anyone, you're stupid.
Hard to separate incompetence from conspiracy, to be honest.
I trust you. And that means they're after you too.
Careful. The plant might not just be here for me.
I trust you. But they still might use the opportunity.
Not now. The risk of betrayal is too great.
I'll make do without. The risk is too high.
Given the current situation, I cannot accept.
Some naturopaths did specialize in slow release poisons...
I was getting along just fine, thank you very much.
...I could use a hand. But I'm not sure if I can trust you.
What was that behind your back?
I cannot afford a distraction. Not at this time.
Not now. I need to keep my eyes open.
Stop. I asked you earlier to back off.
You are more eager to help than is comfortable for me.
I would like you to try a bite first.
Feh. Even if not poisoned, human food never takes well.
THE COVEN COMES FOR ME AT LAST!
I was in need of a preen anyway.
Paint my feathers red. I can take it.
You lot are younger. It's better if I take the blows.
You stop caring after the 100th scar.
If a feather gets stuck in your equipment, I apologise.
I'm not an artist, but painting the walls with blood does sound appealling.
It's about time I did my part.
I have a blade. I can afford to get into melee.
Let's toy with them. I'm actually enjoying this.
We're so far ahead. We can afford a little chaos.
*Screeching in pain and pleasure*
Could someone spare a blade? These feathers need to go.
Slip behind them. I'll draw their fire.
*Warcaw* At me, you fools! I'm not afraid!
*Picking at own feathers*
Just need to get the blood pumping...
I don't desert.
We'll have to fight them again later. Why bother?
*Amused Caw* Go on. Try me again.
It's a proper bloodbath now!
*Sigh* I suppose it's reaching to expect much from these brutes.
I am not disappointed! Just...expecting more.
Why flinch? It doesn't look that bad.
I think you spilt blood on me. I don't mind.
I see the need to move. But I think we're far enough as is.
No need. Our positioning is optimal.
We're ahead. Use it when we aren't.
Save it. These wounds will scar anyway.
If we were actually in trouble, I would accept.
I appreciate it. But I don't need it.
I commend your eagerness, but I can make do.
Someone else might need it. Don't worry about me.
I asked for a blade, not a bandage!
No thanks. I'm in the middle of a good preen.
...Sorry, but not this time. It isn't necessary.
We can get by. You don't need my help.
Gone without food plenty when I was still with the Coven.
...What was my record for fasting? Eight days?
I PUSHED IT TOO FAR!
I don't do this for money. But with that said...
I am your Commander. Remember that.
Know your betters and fall in line, soldiers.
As Commander, I am entitled to double share.
Let me by. My blade is sufficient.
They are vulnerable! Charge!
Let me back. My gun is sufficient.
It is unwise to leave your Commander in the front.
If you had more experience, you would follow my lead.
One second. I must consider our strategy...
Quiet! It is not your place to command me.
My strategy hinges on this move!
Where is our tent? I need a war room to plan!
Where is my share? You know of my experience!
What is this? Our formation is sloppy!
The Coven would be appalled at this treatment of authority!
Very good. I see my oversight has paid off.
Excellent. Much better than your fellows.
I see my experience is still needed.
Looks like you need a few days of Coven training.
What is this? My authority supersedes yours!
I don't normally pull rank, but you must learn your place.
WHY ARE YOU LEAVING ME? I NEED-
I threw it all away...and I still lost her, in the end.
Will I ever see her again? Is there ever a good ending?
I could've had a happy life. Better than dying in this pit...
...I wish I was never here. That none of this ever happened.
Not much left to do, except die on the frontline.
Anywhere my talons can carry me. Not that it matters.
Maybe I'll shoot them from the back. Maybe.
Does it even matter anymore?
Hard to fight a war you no longer believe in.
Biggest lie I told myself was that I was doing this for her.
I have no strategy. Other than to die.
The tactics, the plans, the strategy...it didn't matter. It never did.
It's so cold, sleeping without her.
I'll never see her again, will I? You don't need to lie to me.
Maybe I'll buy you some time. Maybe.
Time for my last stand.
Everything hurts. But not as much as losing her.
She would be ashamed to see me again, wouldn't she? I can't...
Win or lose, I don't want to run.
No point. No point in any of it, really.
There's nothing left. Not for me.
I can't pretend to care anymore.
No more. The fight's been kicked out of me.
I can't get back up. I can't go on.
Why are you still helping me? Why fight on?
I'm sorry. I won't.
I'm not in the mindset. Not sure if I ever will be again.
I can't muster. I wish I could.
Leave me alone! I don't want this anymore.
I know you believe in me. But you shouldn't.
She was such a good cook...but I'll never taste it again.
I'm empty. But not because of the food.
I DON'T CARE ANYMORE!
What is this? Where is Shepard?
Where am I? This isn't Palaven. Or the Normandy.
Who are you people? And where are we?
What year is it? All of this technology is antiquated!
...Feathers? What is this? I'm not myself!
I'm just trying to find my way. Let me forward.
I'll take the front, I suppose.
This thing isn't a sniper, but I suppose it'll do.
If Virmire was any indication, I should not be in melee.
I can't get a handle on this outdated gun!
Gun's overheated. Can't risk firing.
Do I have to listen to everything? Shepard gave us agency...
I've never been a particularly good Turian.
I'm not supposed to be here. I need to find Shepard.
...Why do I have a beak? Where are my mandibles?
Suppose I might as well jump into the fray.
Reminds me of Omega, all those mercs coming after me...
Is this a dream? If so...
I don't even know you. And you've been leering at me.
This must be a nightmare. Only one way to wake up.
Here's hoping I'm just asleep on the Normandy.
This is a good defensive position. Why give it up?
I wasn't a coward then, and I won't be now.
No shields? Oh. Right.
Kinetic barriers haven't been invented yet, have they?
These fighting tactics are different, too.
Every dodge is a gamble. I hate that.
Not Turian Military, but I respect the effort.
Heh. You remind me of Wrex.
I miss Shepard already...
Reminds me of Jack's aim. But you don't have the biotics.
No medigel? That stings.
Took a rocket to the face once, you know.
Almost looked like you had a barrier up.
Almost textbook. Except the year isn't 2185.
From where I come from, teammates don't ask for my position.
Really? Does the sharpshooter not get monopoly on position?
What is that? Not used to it all being outdated...
Is that even sanitized properly? Is any of this?
Not medigel? Then it won't help.
Medical standards really have fallen, haven't they?
The only help I need is to find my way out of here!
How exactly does this help? I geninuely don't know.
No time. I'm busy figuring out how this gun works.
...Why are you asking me to do that? I don't know how.
These aren't dextro rations!
Risking a reaction now wouldn't be wise.
I CAN'T GO ON WITHOUT YOU, SHEPARD!

仲裁官冷酷无情、心狠手辣。他擅长歼灭位于中等位置的敌人，使用步枪、手枪和利刃来完成任务。如果他的同伴动摇了，他知道如何守住底线。
仲裁官身着华丽的服饰，使用多功能军火。他的连发步枪擅长中程射击，可靠的利刃可以应对近战威胁。当这些都不起作用时，切手枪比重新装弹更快。
仲裁官足智多谋，群体意识浓烈。他很好地利用了自己的休息时间。包括搜寻补给品，讲述故事和鼓舞士气，无论是任何团队都会欣赏他的专业知识。

她的厨艺很好……但我再也尝不到她做的东西了。
我很空虚。但不是因为食物。
我再也不在乎了！
这是什么？谢泼德在哪里？
我在哪里？这不是帕拉文。也不是诺曼底号。
你们是谁？我们在哪里？
现在是哪一年？这些技术都过时了！
……羽毛？这是什么？我不像自己了！
我只是想找到正确的路。让我前进吧。
我就前去吧，我猜。
这东西不是狙击枪，但我想这样也行。
从维尔米尔事件来看，我不应该近身作战。
我无法驾驭这把过期的枪！
枪过热了，不能冒险开火。
我必须听从一切吗？谢泼德给予了我们选择的权力……
我从来不是一个特别出色的图腾族人。
我不应该在这里。我需要找到谢泼德。
……为什么我有喙？我的颚部在哪里？
我可能也只能加入战斗了。
这让我想起了欧米伽，那些雇佣兵追杀着我……
这是一个梦吗？如果是的话……
我甚至不认识你。而你一直盯着我看。
这肯定是个噩梦。只有一种方法可以醒过来。
希望我只是在诺曼底号上做梦而已。
这是个很好的防守位置，为什么要放弃呢？
当初我并不胆怯，现在也不会。
没有护盾？哦，对了。
动能屏障还没被发明出来，是吧？
这些战斗策略也有所不同。
每次闪避都是一次赌注。我讨厌这个。
不是图腾族军队，但我尊重你的努力。
嘿，你让我想起了莱克斯。
我已经开始怀念谢泼德了……
你的瞄准让我想起了杰克。但你没有生物感应能力。
没有医疗凝胶？真让人痛苦。
有一次我被火箭炸中脸部，你知道吗。
看起来你差点就有一个护盾了。
几乎是教科书式的。只是现在不是2185年了。
在我那里，队友们都不会问我的位置。
真的吗？难道狙击手不能独占阵地吗？
那是什么？我还不习惯这些都过期的……
这是否得到适当的消毒？还有其他东西吗？
没有医疗凝胶？那没用。
医疗水平真的下降了，是吗？
我唯一需要的帮助就是找到出去的路！
这究竟如何帮助我？我真的不知道。
没时间。我正忙着弄清楚这把枪是怎么工作的。
……你为什么要让我做那个？我不知道怎么做。
这些不是含葡萄糖的食品！
现在冒险引发过激反应是不明智的。
没有你，我无法继续走下去，谢泼德！

냉담할 정도로 효율적이고 무서울 정도로 능숙한 결정자는 소총, 권총, 칼을 휘두르며 중간 열의 적을 처치하고 임무를 완수하는데 탁월합니다. 그의 아군이 흔들리기 시작하더라도 그는 전선을 유지하는 방법을 알고 있습니다.
결정자는 장식된 제복을 입고 상황에 맞는 무기를 사용합니다. 그의 연발 소총은 중거리 상황에서 탁월하며 그의 믿음직한 칼은 근접전을 처리하는 데 사용됩니다. 그리고 모든 방법이 실패하는 경우에는 재장전하는 것보다 권총을 사용하는 게 빠릅니다.
수완이 풍부하고 보기보다 사교적인 결정자는 자신의 휴식 시간을 잘 활용합니다. 그 어떤 원정대라도 그의 보급품, 이야깃거리, 그리고 불굴의 의지를 높이 평가할 것입니다.

무기를 뽑아라!
무기를 뽑아라!
세계의 심장, 집회가 원했던 모든 것. 하지만 그것은 나와 함께 죽을 것이다.
제복에 불이 붙었다!
연기가 내 눈을 태우고 있어!
*몸부림치며 비명을 지름*
내가 벌이는 전쟁은 무의미하구나...
보고 싶었어, 내 사랑.
너와 함께할 수 있는 시간이 더 길었으면...
내 사랑은 널 위한 것이 아니야, 노파!
감히 그런 감정을 이용하려 하다니!
더는 심리전에 당해주지 않겠다.
탐욕스러운 시체매 자식들...
...예상했던 것보다 고통스럽군.
서로 감정 상하지 않았으면 하네, 이해해 주겠나?
...우리가 항상 이 정도로 닮았던가?
아... 이런 느낌이었겠군.
이래야 해서 죄송합니다 지휘관님.
브린...당신을 언젠간 또 만날 수 있는 건가?
...이미 예상한 일인데도 쉽지 않을 모양이군.
난 언제나 여분을 가져오지.
난 너무나 많은 동료가 출혈사하는 것을 봤다네. 그들을 따라가면 안 되겠지.
전쟁 상황에선 보급품이 많을수록 좋지.
노라는 이런 걸 들고 다녔었지. 잘 지내고 있으려나...
그들은 많은 것에 대해 틀렸지만 싸우는 법에 대해서만은 틀린 적이 없었네.
내가 갓난아기 때부터 그들에게 키워졌던 탓인지 그때의 가르침을 잊긴 힘들다네.
그들의 주입식 사상을 무시하면 그들의 몇몇 전술은 훌륭했지.
주렐은 나에게 많은 것을 가르쳤지. 그가 지금의 나를 보면 어떻게 생각할까나...
멍들고 낡았지만 아직 망가지진 않았다네.
전쟁 중엔 자부심은 없다네, 걷어차이고 나서 다시 일어날 뿐.
그 누구도 무적이 아니기에 난 내가 그렇다는 척 연기하지 않을 거라네.
이야기 하나 들려주지.
노라, 펠넘, 주리엘. 그들은 내 분대원이었지.
왜 여기 있는지 물었나? 철권통치, 그리고 오랫동안 기다렸던 배신 때문이지.
노라만이 그 사건의 여파에서 살아남았고, 우린 곧 헤어졌지.
그 집회를 떠난 것은 나에게 일어난 최고의 일이지.
...나는 그들에게 도구에 불과했지만 난 너무 많은 것을 알았지.
누가 먼저 10명을 처치할지 내기 하나 해보게나?
내 부리에 난 흉터가 궁금한가? 물론 이야기해 주지.
브린은 자네를 좋아했을 거라네. 정말로 그립구나...
난 붕대를 뜯어내는 것을 선호하지, 아프다면 미안하네.
그다지 훌륭히 치료하진 않았지만 현재로선 충분할 거라네.
해를 끼치는 게 치유하는 것보다 쉬운 건 인정하지.
잡지를 장전하는 것을 도와주게 - 불쾌한 일을 잠시 잊도록 해줄 것이라네.
걱정할 만하지, 우리의 일은 쉽지 않으니...
이야기해 보게나, 적어도 들어줄 수는 있으니.
역시 자네들과 동행하는 것이 맞는 선택이였군.
일반적인 까마귀 집회의 임무보다 잘되어가는군. 훌륭해.
우리가 마을에 돌아오면 음료는 내가 한턱내지.
경고 사격은 내 사전에 없는 단어지.
똑똑 - 독수리님께서 오셨습니다.
쏠 거면 큰 한 방을 노려야지.
쉽게 끝내보지.
앉아서 일어나라 말아라.
하나 잡았다!
조준 후 처치 완료!
이 새는 총기를 가지고 있단다.
허허, 이거 전혀 상대가 안 되는군.
측면이 위험해!
대열을 무너뜨리려고 하는군!
이런, 위치에서 벗어났군!
전선을 유지해라!
무기 사용을 허가한다.
전방 주시 중.
대열을 유지하도록.
눈이 아프군.
제복이 가는군...
화학전은 반칙이지!
나 치료가 필요하다!
총이 막히지 않는 한...
...언젠간 응고되겠지.
마른 방아쇠 손가락을 유지해야 해...
참나, 바로 얼룩이 졌군.
*이를 악문다*
이게 전쟁의 최악점이다.
지금 나랑 장난하냐?
아이고 고마워 죽겠네.
다음에는 다른 사람이 하면 안되나?
오, 좋은 느낌이야.
광택이 좋긴 하네...
드디어 여행한 보람이 있군.
머리가 정말 아프군.
어서 정신 차려야지...
걷다 보면...나아질 거야.
제기랄, 엄청 아프네.
*피를 토함*
필요하면 나에게 기대시게.
여기 부상자 있다!
자네, 괜찮나?
모든 전쟁은 언젠간 끝나지...
내...내가 앉지 못하게 해주게.
수...숨을 못 쉬겠어...
저-정말 위험했군...
자네에게 정말로 큰 빚을 졌군.
일단 버터보게!
위생병! 지원군! 누구 없는 건가?
지금 당장 응급처치가 필요해!
...그래, 좋은 느낌이었어.
이젠 전투 같지도 않네.
오! 널 좀 봐!
어이 박사, 굳이 이걸 해야 하는 건가?
도대체 뭘 한 건가?
저것도 판돈을 높이는 방법이긴 하지만...
왜 까마귀 집회가 자네에 관심이 있었는지 이제 알겠군.
자네라면 훌륭한 지휘관이 되었을 거라네.
아직 안 보여준 재주 없나?
내 시간을 낭비하려 하지 말게.
이런 의미 없는 임무는 사양하겠네!
어건 어떻게 봐도 군사 작전이 아니라네.
이거 좀 너무 욕심내는 거 아닌가?
지금 나보고 죽으라고 하는 건가?
재배정을 요청하겠네.
까마귀 집회도 이런 걸 했었지.
여기서도 누가 내 머릿속을 해부하려 하는 건가?
뭐, 자연요법을 받는 것보단 낫지.
이게 널 기분 좋게 해준다면 됐어.
빨리 시작해서 빨리 끝내지.
이번엔 나한테 무슨 문제가 있는 건가?
내가 문제인 건가 아니면 또 다른 뭔가 있는 건가?
언제나 심장이 뛰게 만드는군!
난 내 발톱이 더러워지는 것을 두려워하지 않지.
고통 없이는 얻는 것도 없다.
깃을 고를 좋은 방법이지.
브린은 이곳을 좋아했을 텐데.
평온한 시절이 생각나게 하는군.
언제나 그다지 종교적인 새는 아니었지만...
난 속죄할 게 많지.
사격 대결에서 나를 이길 수 있다면 돈지갑 하나 주지!
항상 카드 게임을 좋아했었지.
자네 칩 좀 있는 모양이군.
한 파인트를 위해서라면 사람을 죽이기까지 하겠네.
나와 술 게임 한번 해볼 사람 있는가?
건배!
고기 안주 있는가? 생이면 더 좋고.
외상을 달아주게.
널 보니 그녀가... 그말 무시하게.
걱정하지 말게, 부드럽게 대해 줄 테니.
약속하지, 넌 제대로 대해 주겠어.
이만큼의 버-드 파워를 감당할 수 있다고 생각하나?
지루해 보이는군.
내가 마을에서 앉아 있고 싶다면 공짜로 할 수 있는걸.
명상이라고? 뭐 이런 시간 낭비가 다 있나!
이런 걸 왜 돈 주고 하는 거지?
솔직히 말하지, 나도 동감이라네.
저건 도대체 어디에서 찾은 건가?
넌 나를 짐승이라고 부르면서도 저건 괜찮다는 건가?
물러가라, 깃털 달린 악마야! 난 너의 속임수를 간파했으니!
너희 모두 어리석구나! 그녀는 틀림없이 조류 스파이다!
왜 저것이 여기에 있는 것을 허용하는 거지?! 저건 적이야!
아, 그리고 저것이 우리를 쪼기 시작하면 변호해 줄 생각인 건가?!

정말 미안하네, 브린.
대인 저지력은 값싸게 얻지 못하지.
그가 날 구해줘서 천만다행이야.
좋은 권총집은 정말 중요하지.
자비란 없다.
효과적이지만 반동이 심하지.
우리가 항상 이 정도로 닮았던가?
무한한 합창을 받으며...
모든 것에도 불구하고 흠집 하나 없는.
공격받을 때:
그녀의 말이 맞았어, 난 이거보다 잘할 수 있어.
그녀는 나를 믿었고, 그 선택은 틀리지 않았어.
그녀가 나에게 가르쳐 준 것처럼 숨을 크게 쉬자.
압박 속에서도 침착하게, 난 할 수 있어.
난 모든 것을 잃을 수 있지만 모든 것을 얻을 수도 있지.
난 두렵지 않아, 아직 탄약이 남았으니까.
마음을 굳게 먹게 - 이 독수리가 널 믿고 있다네.
날 봐, 우린 해낼 수 있어, 언제나 그랬으니.
난 절대로 목표물을 놓치지 않아.
나에게 주어진 임무가 하나뿐인데도 내가 그걸 실패할 생각 없다.
머릿속을 비우게, 자네는 포식자고 그들은 먹잇감이네.
이제 자네도 나처럼 볼 수 있을 거네.
장난은 이제 끝, 저들을 처리할 시간이다.
충분히 갖고 놀았으니 이제 죽일 시간이다.
진형의 약점을 하나씩 공략하면 쓰러트릴 수 있을 것이야.
우린 먹이사슬의 최상위에 있어. 이제 우리가 걸맞게 행동할 때가 왔네.
나는 생존하기 위해 태어났으며 적응할 수 있도록 키워졌어.
약함 속에서 강함이 있으며 수고에서 힘을 찾을 수 있다.
이건 내가 사는 이유, 그리고 내 삶의 목적이야.
저들은 나에게 빈틈을 보였고 난 그것을 큰 기회로 만들겠어.
까마귀 집회에서 견뎌야 했던 그 어떤 것보다도 심각하군.
내가 생각한 대로 이건 자살 임무였군...
난 탈영하지 않겠지만 그 누구도 그러고 싶다면 탓하지 않겠네.
우리가 많은 적을 죽였는데도 이 지옥 같은 곳은 계속해서 저들을 뱉어내는구나!
이건 내가 후퇴하는 게 아니라고 약속하지.
아니 그게...내 총이 뒷열에서 더 효과적이라서.
음 그게...재장전할 시간을 주게!
*총을 더듬는 중*
이곳에는 안전한 곳이 없어, 우리는 우리 자신을 속이고 있다네.
아직 경계를 확보하지도 않았는데 어떻게 안전할 것으로 생각하는 건가?
*과호흡 중*
이건 무리야. 우리 지금 후퇴해야 해!
이런 도박 같은 전략을 따른 게 실수였어.
...정말 야 같은 우연이군.
내가 생각한 것보다 우리는 상대가 안 되는군.
이걸로 우리가 이길 가능성이 바닥을 치는군.
해볼 용기 내기가 힘든 건 맞지?
솔직히 말하자면 그 공격이 치명적일 줄 알았네.
확실히 나보다 자네가 당하는 게 낫지.
자네는 나보다 훨씬 대담하군.
아니...못하겠어, 미안하네.
안돼! 그러면 측면이 위험해진다고!
아 그게...지금 그런 걸 할 마음가짐이 아니라서.
소용없어, 집중을 못하겠어.
더 이상 못 견디겠어!
...네놈들과 동햏한 게 실수였어.
네놈이 싸우지 못하겠다면 내가 싸우게 만들겠어.
내가 이해심이 많은 걸 복으로 여겨라, 까마귀 집회는 이보다 훨씬 가혹했으니.
그 누구도 탈영하면 쏘겠다.
나는 네 상급자다. 고로 넌 본 장교의 지시를 따른다.
넌 나에게 명령할 자격이 없어.
어서 쉬어라. 내일은 일찍 일어나야 하니 그리 알도록.
지금 좋은 말로 할 때 당장 팔 굽혀 펴기 20회 실시!. 즉시 시행하지 않을 경우 50회로 늘린다!
내가 이래야 한다는 사실 자체가 얼마나 심각한지 보여주는군.
더 열심히 싸워라! 불복종하면 무슨 일이 일어날지 맛보게 해줄 테니.
아직 부족해, 한 번 더.
흠, 좋아.
여기가 까마귀 집회였다면 넌 총을 맞았을 거야.
책임질 시간이다, 변명하려 하지 말아라.
본관이 친절히 상기시켜 주지. 무능함은 처벌 사유이다.
내가 직접 너에게 동기 부여를 해야 하는 수고를 덜어 주는군.
네놈이 거기 가만히 있는 게 좋을 듯하군.
명심하도록, 본관은 그 어떤 위치도 점할 수 있다.
입닥쳐라, 내 인내심이 바닥난 지 오래됐다.
명심하도록, 본관에게서 무언가를 요청하려 하지 말아라.
지금 내가 네 도움이 필요한 것처럼 보이나?
내가 널 필요로 했다면 내가 도와달라고 했겠지.
네놈 모두 탈영병이야! 당장 내가-!
이번엔 그 집회가 얼마를 주고 너를 보낸 거지?
내 행동이 후한을 불러올 것임을 알았어야 했어...
너희들 모두가 배신자가 아니더라도 위험을 무릅쓰고 싶지 않아.
지금 자신이 심어진 사람임을 인정한다면 빠르게 끝내주지.
양해해 주지, 지금도 거의 신뢰하지 못하니.
왜 갑자기 내 위치에 대해 안달인 건가?
배신당하는 것보다 이러는 게 낫지.
돕고 싶지만, 당분간은 눈 똑바로 뜨고 있어야 할 것 같네.
예측 불가능성은 나의 생존을 보장하기 힘들 것 같다네.
미안하군, 이번엔 지시를 따르지 못하겠네.
다치고 싶다면 내 잠을 방해해 보시지.
명심하도록, 오늘 밤 조사가 있을 것이니.
작별이다, 배신자 놈아.
넌 날 속일 뻔했지.
거짓 매복? 까마귀 집회가 흔히 사용하는 전법이지.
거절하지, 난 이런 상황이 어떻게 진행되는지 본 적 있다네.
머리 좋군, 날 두 편의 사이에 끼워 넣다니.
내 신뢰를 얻고 싶다면 어서 날 엄호해!
얼마나 깊은 음모인지 궁금하군.
의도적으로 한 건가? 아니 그럴 리가...
그들도 음모에 참여하는 거면...
운이 좋았던 것뿐인가 이님 네놈 모두가 저들과 한편인 건가?
지금 네가 누굴 속이고 있다고 생각하는 건가? 멍청하게도.
솔직히 말하자면 그게 무능력함 때문인지 음모를 짠 건지 구분하기 힘들군.
난 널 믿어, 다시 말해 그들이 너도 노리고 있다는 거지.
조심하게, 여기 심어진 놈이 나만을 노리는 게 아닐 수도 있으니.
난 널 믿지만, 그들이 이걸 기회로 삼을 수도 있단 건 여전해.
아직 아니야, 배신당할 위험이 너무 커.
위험에 처할 가능성이 너무 높기 때문에 사양하겠네.
현 상황으로는 사양할 수밖에 없다네.
몇몇 자연요법사들은 서방성 독극물을 전문으로 했었지...
난 지금 상태 괜찮으니 사양하지.
도움이 필요하긴 하지만 내가 널 믿을 수 있는지가 의문이군.
등 뒤에 뭘 숨기는 거지?
지금 내 주의가 산만해질 여유 없다.
지금은 안돼, 눈을 크게 뜨고 있어야 하니.
멈춰라, 내가 아까 물러서라고 했지.
넌 불편할 정도로 날 도우려고 하는군.
네가 먼저 한입 하시지.
쳇, 독이 없더라도 인간의 음식은 잘 먹히지 않아.
드디어 까마귀 집회가 날 잡으러 오는구나!
어차피 깃털 고를 시간이었는데, 뭐.
내 깃털을 붉게 물들어 주게, 견딜 수 있으니.
너희들은 어리니 내가 대신 공격받는 게 낫지.
100번째 흉터 이후에는 무신경해지지.
장비에 깃털이 끼었다면 사과하지.
내가 화가는 아니지만 벽을 피로 한번 칠해 보고 싶어지는군.
내 역할을 수행할 때가 왔군.
난 칼이 있으니 근접전에 참여해도 되지, 하하.
저것들 가지고 놀아 볼 쳐? 이거 생각보다 재밌는걸.
이 정도로 이기고 있는데 조금은 막무가내로 해도 되겠지?
*고통과 쾌락의 비명*
누군가 내어줄 칼 없는가? 제거할 깃털이 많다네.
저들의 등 뒤로 슬그머니 다가서게, 내가 공격을 유도할 테니.
*전투의 지저귐* 공격해 봐라 어리석은 것들아! 난 두렵지 않다!
*자신의 깃털을 뽑아내는 중*
심장이 뛰게 만들기만 한다면...
난 탈영하지 않겠어.
어차피 저들과 다시 싸워야 할 텐데 도망쳐서 뭐 해?
*즐거운 지저귐* 한 번 더 해보시지 그래.
드디어 피가 흐르기 시작하는군!
*한숨 쉬며* 저 짐승들에게서 뭔갈 기대한 내 잘못이지.
실망한 건 아니지만...뭔가 더 많은 걸 기대하고 있었다네.
왜 움찔하는 거지? 그리 심해 보이지도 않은걸.
자네가 내 위에 피를 흘린 것 같군, 난 상관없지만.
움직일 필요성은 알겠지만 난 이미 늦었다고 생각하네.
필요 없다네, 이게 최적의 진형이니.
이기고 있지 않을 때 사용하지.
쓰지 마라, 어차피 이 상처들은 흉터로 남을 테니.
우리가 정말로 위기에 빠진 게 아니니 사양하지.
의도는 고맙지만 난 필요가 없다네.
자네의 열의를 칭찬하지만 난 없어도 된다네.
다른 사람이 필요할 수도 있으니 내 걱정 하지 말게.
난 칼을 달라고 했지, 붕대를 달라고 한 적 없다!
깃털 고르는 중이니 사양하지.
...미안하지만 이번은 안 되겠네, 불필요하니.
우린 이것 없이도 괜찮을 것이니 넌 내 도움이 필요하지 않은걸.
내가 까마귀 집회에 속했을 적에 자주 음식 못 먹고 지냈지.
내 금식 최고 기록이 뭐였더라? 8일인가?
너무 무리했구나!
내가 이걸 돈을 위해 하는 건 아니지만 이야기가 나욌으니...
난 네놈들의 사령관이다, 명심하도록.
내가 너희들의 상급자임을 알고 줄을 서도록 해라.
본관은 사령관으로서 두 배의 지분을 가질 자격이 있다.
난 내 칼이면 충분하니 앞으로 나가겠다.
저들이 허점을 보인다! 돌격!
내 총을 쓰고 싶으니 난 뒤로 물러서겠다.
사령관을 앞줄에 놓는 건 현명하지 않다.
조금도 경험이 있는 자라면 내 지시를 따랐을 거야.
잠시만, 우리가 따를 전략을 검토해 봐야겠어
입닥쳐! 넌 본관에게 지시를 내릴 자격이 없어.
이 기술 하나에 내 전략의 성공 여부가 걸려 있다!
텐트가 없는 건가? 난 전략을 세우기 위한 작전실이 필요하다!
내 몫은 어디에 있는 거지? 내 경험이 필요 없단 건가?
이게 뭐야! 뭐 이런 허술한 진형이 다 있어?
집회의 사람들이 이걸 봤다면 권위자에 대한 이런 대우에 경악했을 거야!
그래 좋아, 내가 간과한 점이 결과를 보이는군.
훌륭해, 네 동료들보다 훨씬 낫군.
역시 내 경험이 아직 필요한 것으로 보이는군.
넌 며칠 동안 까마귀 집회 표 훈련을 받을 필요가 있어 보이는군.
지금 뭐 하는 거지? 난 네놈의 상급자다!
난 보통 내 직위를 남용하지 않지만, 넌 버릇을 고쳐줘야겠어.
왜 날 떠나는 거지? 난 너희가-
내가 모든 것을 버렸음에도 난 결국 그녀를 잃었지.
내가 정말로 언젠가 그녀를 다시 볼 수 있는 건가? 이런 좋은 결말이 존재하긴 하는 건가?
내가 이런 곳에서 죽지 않고 행복한 삶을 살 수도 있었는데...
내가 여기에 오지 않았다면 이런 일이 벌어지지 않았을 텐데...
앞줄에서 죽는 것밖에는 할 일이 없다네.
갈 수 있는 곳이라면 다 괜찮아, 아무 의미 없지만.
어쩌면 뒷줄에서 저들을 쏘는 게 괜찮을 수도...
뭘 하더라도 이제 상관없지 않은가?
더 이상 의미가 없다고 생각하는 전쟁을 싸우는 건 힘들지.
내가 그녀를 위해 이걸 하고 있다는 건 내가 나에게 한 가장 큰 거짓말이지.
죽는 것 이외에는 작전이 없다네.
내가 세운 전술, 계획, 전략... 결국에는 처음부터 모두 헛수고였다네.
그녀 없이 잠자려 하니 너무나 춥군.
난 그녀를 영원히 보지 못할 거지? 거짓말할 필요 없어.
어쩌면 널 위해 시간을 벌어줄 수도...
내 최후의 결전의 시간이 왔군.
온몸이 아프지만 그녀를 잃은 고통과는 비교도 안 되지.
그녀가 나를 다시 보게 되면 부끄러워할 게 뻔하지 않은가? 난...
이기든 지든 도망치고 싶지 않네.
해봤자야, 아무것도 의미 없어.
나에게 더 이상 남은 게 없다네.
더 이상 그럴 힘도 없다네.
그만하게, 난 싸울 의지가 사라졌으니.
다시 일어서지 못하겠다네, 계속할 의지도 없고.
왜 아직도 날 도우려고 하는 거지? 뭘 위해 싸우는 거지?
미안하지만 거절하지.
그럴 마음가짐이 아니라네, 다시는 가지지 않을 것 같고.
하고 싶어도 해볼 의지가 나질 않는다네.
혼자 있게 놔두게! 더 이상 하고 싶지 않다네.
네가 날 믿는다는 것은 알겠지만 그만두는 게 좋을 거라네.
그녀가 요리를 정말 잘했지만 난 그걸 영원히 다시 맛보지 못하겠지.
내 속이 텅 비었군, 음식 탓이 아니고.
이제 다 상관없어!
이게 뭐야? 셰퍼드는 어디 있는 거지?
여긴 어디지? 여긴 팔라벤도, 노르망디도 아니잖아.
당신들 누구야? 우린 어디에 있는 거지?
지금이 몇 년이지? 기술이 다 고전적이잖아!
...깃털이라고? 이게 뭐야? 이건 내가 아니야!
난 그저 내 갈 길 찾는 거야, 지나가게 해줘.
내가 앞줄에 서지 뭐.
이건 저격용 총이 아니지만 지금으로선 충분해.
비미어에서의 작전을 생각하면 난 근접전에 말려들면 안 되겠어.
이런 낡은 총 가지곤 감을 못 잡겠어!
총이 과열했어, 더 이상 쏘는 건 위험해.
모든 지시를 따라야 하는 건가? 셰퍼드는 각자 선택하도록 해줬는데...
난 딱히 질서바른 투리안인였던 적 없지.
난 여기에 있을 수 없어, 어서 셰퍼드를 찾아야 해.
왜 나에게 부리가 있는 거지? 내 하악골은 어디 있는 거야?
이렇게 됐으니 싸움에 참여하도록 하지.
오메가에서 나를 노리던 수많은 용병이 생각나는군...
이건 꿈인가? 그렇다면...
난 네가 누군지도 모르는데 넌 날 왜 계속 쳐다보고 있는거지?
이건 악몽임이 틀림없어. 깰 방법은 이것뿐이지.
난 그저 노르망디에서 잠들어 있길 바라며.
이렇게 좋은 위치를 왜 버리려 하는 거지?
난 그때도 겁쟁이가 아니었고 지금도 변화 없어.
음, 방어막이? 아 맞다.
아직 동역학 장벽이 발명되지 않은 모양이군.
저들의 전투 방식도 다르군.
회피할 때마다 도박 해야 하는 기분 참 드럽군.
투리안 군인보단 덜하지만, 노력하는 건 칭찬하지.
헷, 널 보니 렉스가 생각나는군.
벌써 셰퍼드가 보고 싶어지는군...
잭의 조준 실력이 생각나는군, 넌 바이오틱 능력이 없긴 하지만.
메디젤은 없는 건가? 따끔하겠군.
난 얼굴에 로켓을 맞은 적이 있다고.
거의 너가 방어막을 세운 것처럼 보였네.
거의 교과서적이야, 연도가 2185가 아닌 것 빼고는.
내가 있었던 곳에선 팀원들이 내 위치를 점하려 하지 않았어.
장난하나? 명사수는 좋은 위치를 독점하지 못한다는 건가?
저게 뭐지? 모두 구식이라 뭔지 모르겠네...
여기 있는 것 중에 제대로 소독된 게 있나?
메디젤이 아니라고? 그럼 무소용이야.
의료 수준이 곤두박질쳤군.
내가 여길 나갈 길을 찾는 도움이 아니라면 다 필요 없다!
이게 무슨 도움이 된단 거지? 정말로 모르겠군.
그럴 시간 없어, 난 지금 이 총이 어떻게 작동하는지 알아내느라 바쁘다고.
.왜 나한테 그런 걸 시키려는 거지? 난 어떻게 하는지 모른다고!
이건 덱스트로 식량이 아니잖아!
지금 반응하면 위험할지도 몰라.
셰퍼드! 난 당신 없이는 못 살겠어!

냉담할 정도로 효율적이고 무서울 정도로 능숙한 결정자는 소총, 권총, 칼을 휘두르며 중간 열의 적을 처치하고 임무를 완수하는데 탁월합니다. 그의 아군이 흔들리기 시작하더라도 그는 전선을 유지하는 방법을 알고 있습니다.
결정자는 장식된 제복을 입고 상황에 맞는 무기를 사용합니다. 그의 연발 소총은 중거리 상황에서 탁월하며 그의 믿음직한 칼은 근접전을 처리하는 데 사용됩니다. 그리고 모든 방법이 실패하는 경우에는 재장전하는 것보다 권총을 사용하는 게 빠릅니다.
수완이 풍부하고 보기보다 사교적인 결정자는 자신의 휴식 시간을 잘 활용합니다. 그 어떤 원정대라도 그의 보급품, 이야깃거리, 그리고 불굴의 의지를 높이 평가할 것입니다.

공격받을 때:
그녀의 말이 맞았어, 난 이거보다 잘할 수 있어.

난 모든 것을 잃을 수 있지만 모든 것을 얻을 수도 있지.
난 두렵지 않아, 아직 탄약이 남았으니까.
마음을 굳게 먹게 - 이 독수리가 널 믿고 있다네.
날 봐, 우린 해낼 수 있어, 언제나 그랬으니.
난 절대로 목표물을 놓치지 않아.

장난은 이제 끝, 저들을 처리할 시간이다.
충분히 갖고 놀았으니 이제 죽일 시간이다.

나는 생존하기 위해 태어났으며 적응할 수 있도록 키워졌어.

...네놈들과 동햏한 게 실수였어.

그 누구도 탈영하면 쏘겠다.

어서 쉬어라. 내일은 일찍 일어나야 하니 그리 알도록.
지금 좋은 말로 할 때 당장 팔 굽혀 펴기 20회 실시!. 즉시 시행하지 않을 경우 50회로 늘린다!
내가 이래야 한다는 사실 자체가 얼마나 심각한지 보여주는군.
더 열심히 싸워라! 불복종하면 무슨 일이 일어날지 맛보게 해줄 테니.
아직 부족해, 한 번 더.
흠, 좋아.
